Headline: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland Temporary Reroute at Narragansett/Wellington
ShortDescription: 86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are rerouted via Narragansett, Diversey, Austin, Belmont and Narragansett due to street blockage near Narragansett/Wellington.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Narragansett, Diversey, Austin, Belmont and Narragansett: due to street blockage near Narragansett/Wellington.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Reroute at Jackson/Kostner
ShortDescription: 126 Jackson buses are temp rerouted in both directions via Jackson, Pulaski, Madison, Cicero and Jackson. Due to fire department activity near Jackson/Kostner

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Jackson, Pulaski, Madison, Cicero and Jackson then resume their normal route on Jackson, due to fire department activity near Jackson/Kostner

Allow extra travel time.
